title: Director @ Utah Office of Tourism, Film and Global Branding
summary: In her role with the Utah Office of Tourism, Vicki Varela was the driving force behind the implementation and expansion of The Mighty Five® campaign promoting Utah’s five national parks and implementation of the Find Your Greatest® ski campaign. Varela’s team expanded Utah’s international and digital marketing strategies while developing new analytics and research practices. Under her leadership, the office’s marketing budget grew from $9 million to $21 million.
